name: Arithmetic
description: Performs arithmetic operations on numeric values

minValueCount.label: Min. operand count
minValueCount.description: Minimum number of operands for calculation

help.description: Performs arithmetic operations (sum, difference, product, round, mean, min, max) on numeric values from multiple messages.

value.name: value
value.description: Numeric operand for the calculation (via msg property matching)

minuend.name: minuend
minuend.description: For subtraction: the value to subtract from (optional, only for 'difference' operation)

payload.name: payload
payload.description: The calculated result with configured precision

details.text: Configure matchers to identify which message properties contain operands. Messages are matched and collected until the minimum operand count is reached.
Additional static operands can be added in the configuration for operations other than 'round'.
For 'difference' operation, configure a 'minuend' matcher to specify which value to subtract from.
The result is rounded to the configured precision (number of decimal places).
Operations: add (sum), sub (difference), mul (product), round (round to precision), mean (average), min (minimum), max (maximum).
